column2: MD501 TAMWORTH (INCLUSIVE) TO BIRMINGHAM PROOF HOUSE JN

Only one train is permitted in the section between Kingsbury Reception Sidings and the terminals at any one time.Incoming Intermodal trains for Birch Coppice Terminal to show 3 minute OP stop for acceptance purposes.Departing Intermodal trains from Birch Coppice Terminal to show 2 minute OP stop.Incoming trains for Kingsbury Oil Terminal to show 30 minute OP stop for acceptance purposes.Departing trains from Kingsbury Oil Terminal to show 60 minute OP stop to prepare the train and conduct alocomotive run round.Incoming trains for Kingsbury E.M.R Sidings to show a 5 minute OP stop.Departing trains from Kingsbury E.M.R Sidings to show 20 minute OP stop to prepare the train and conduct alocomotive run round.
Only one train can pass Kingsbury Shunt Frame at any one time.
Train from Kingsbury Oil terminal that haspropelled at Kingsbury Reception Sidingstowards Tamworth
